---
title: "Estimated call locations"
output: html_document
params:
  fit: NA
  anispeed: = NA
---

```{r setup, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}

session <- 1:length(fit$args$capt)

```


```{r animation, eval=TRUE,echo=FALSE,fig.show='animate',message=FALSE,width = 7, height = 7}

for(j in session){
frames <- nrow(params$fit$args$capt[[j]]$bincapt)
out <- vector("list", frames)
oopt = ani.options(interval = params$anispeed,loop = 1, nmax = frames,
ani.width = 600,ani.height = 600,single.opts =  "'utf8': false, 'theme': 'dark'")
 for (i in 1:ani.options("nmax")) {
  locations(params$fit,i,session = j)
  legend("top",legend = paste("call",i,sep = " "),bty = "n")
  ani.pause()
}

}

ani.options(oopt)

```
